__e: Our justice is far quicker than yours, I promise you.
I'm learning in the criminal justice business, that isn't long.
Ladies and gentlemen, I don't doubt your good faith for a moment, nor your wish to assist justice.
You help me find them and bring them to justice, and then maybe in time you and I can rebuild what we had.
I want you to help me find them and bring them to justice.
...united against the apathy of justice and of a certain faction of the police. We're ready to help, support and defend you. - You can turn us down.
And I want justice for all the other people whose lives are bought and sold, so that a few big shots can climb up on their backs and laugh at the law and laugh at human decency.
I believe in a strong judicial system... and the right to assimilate into the country I love!
